src:
Polisi Selidiki Dugaaan Murid Lain yang Diajak Threesome Bu Guru di Bali
07 Nov 2019, 16:11 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Denpasar - Siswi di Buleleng, Bali menjadi korban pemuas nafsu guru Ni Made Sri Novi Darmaningsih (29) dan pacarnya AA Putu Wartayasa (36) untuk threesome. Polisi bakal menyelidiki dugaan adanya murid lain yang diajak bu guru Novi untuk threesome.
"Ya (akan dilakukan penyelidikan)," kata Kapolres Buleleng AKBP Suratno lewat pesan singkat, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Kepada polisi, Novi dan pacarnya Putu mengaku terinspirasi dengan film porno. Hanya saja polisi belum menemukan apakah perbuatan bejat itu didokumentasikan.
"Sementara tidak (tidak direkam-red)," jawab Suratno.
text:
Police Investigate Allegations of Other Students Invited by Teacher's Threesome in Bali
Nov 7 2019, 16:11 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Denpasar - Students in Buleleng, Bali are victims of teacher Satisfaction of Ni Made Sri Novi Darmaningsih (29) and her boyfriend AA Putu Wartayasa (36) for a threesome. Police will investigate allegations of other students invited by Novi's teacher for a threesome.
"Yes (an investigation will be carried out)," said the Head of the Police Headquarters of AKBP Suratno via text message on Thursday (11/07/2019).
To the police, Novi and his girlfriend Putu claimed to be inspired by pornographic films. It's just that the police haven't found out whether the depraved act was documented.
"While not (not recorded-ed)," Suratno answered.
